mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_redis_benchmark ( metric_time, pool_active, pool_idle, pool_waiting, hit_rate, keyspace_hits, keyspace_misses, total_commands, avg_command_usec, max_command_usec, remark ) VALUES ( #{metricTime}, #{poolActive}, #{poolIdle}, #{poolWaiting}, #{hitRate}, #{keyspaceHits}, #{keyspaceMisses}, #{totalCommands}, #{avgCommandUsec}, #{maxCommandUsec}, #{remark} )
